```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
tomato <- read.csv(here("data", "tomato_data.csv"))
```

Write a line that returns the 3rd, 7th, and 9th rows of data.

```{r}
tomatoslim <- tomato |> slice(3, 7, 9)
```

Write a line of code that finds all of the plants fromt he frtilizer treatment with avg_tomato_weight_g > or equal to 145 g

```{r}
tomatosum <- tomato |> filter(Avg_tomato_weight_g >= 145)
```
